Title: Prohibits the dissemination of an image of a crime victim by public servants
Summary: Creates the crime of dissemination of an image of a crime victim; makes a person guilty of such crime where the person is a public servant and, while in the course of the public servant's official duties, records a still image or motion picture of a crime victim and broadcasts or publishes such images or motion pictures outside of the course of conduct of the public servant's official duties; makes such crime a class A misdemeanor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the dissemination of an image of a crime victim by public servants
